text: (He muham'mada) yastai maile tapa'ila'i yasa samudayama patha'eko chu, jasabhanda agadi dherai samudayaharu gujrisakeka chan. Tapa'ile uniharula'i hamro tarphabata jo tapa'immathi vahya utari'eko cha padhera suna'unus. Yini rahamanaka munkira hun. Tapa'i bhanidinus ki mero palanakarta ta uhi ho ra usako satta vastavama kohi pani upasana yogya chaina. Usaimathi mero bharosa cha, ra usaitarpha maile pharkinu cha
